GoalDefinition.name: GoalDefinition
GoalDefinition.description: Represents a goal or a business objective thatâ€™s used as a reference. When instantiated, GoalDefinition records create GoalAssignment records that serve as goals in care plans.

Category.description: The category that the defined goal belongs to.

Description.description: The description of the defined goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the goal definition record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this goal definition record.

ParentGoalId.description: The ID of the parent record.

Status.description: The status of the goal defintion.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the defined goal.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the defined goal.

GoalDefinition.accessRules: In Integrated Care Management, this object represents the definition of a care plan goal in the reusable PGI library.
